select

select
,
from t_order_aunt where user_orderid = #{user_orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state != 8

,
from t_order_aunt where user_orderid = #{user_orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 16

,

,
from t_order_aunt where user_orderid = #{user_orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 8

select count(*) from t_order_aunt where poster_type = 1 and auntid = #{companyid} and (state = 6 or state = 7)

select count(*) from t_order_aunt where auntid = #{dataid} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,server_time,now())>= -3 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,server_time,now()) <=3 and state <> 5 and state <> 6 and state <> 7 and state <> 9 and state <> 12 and state <> 14 and complaint_state = 0
